name: Trickstar Fusion
effectText: Fusion Summon 1 "Trickstar" Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, using monsters from your hand or field as Fusion Material. You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 "Trickstar" monster in your GY; add it to your hand, but you cannot Normal Summon/Set or Special Summon monsters with that name for the rest of this turn.
